Text.Page:
Aaaargh! did you see that kumas chasing me? So, who are you again?

Wait, you want to take Titus with you? Without him we won't be able to produce our valuable goods...

I mean, maybe if we had a supply of relics, we could make it up in volume... Wait! I have an idea!"What can I do for you."

It's simple! There are many Omphalos Relics over the next rise. Before the orcans invaded, we could easily gather and sell them at a good price.

But now that area is crawling with kumases, and they take special skills to deal with.

You look like someone who gets lots of practice using spacial skills. So what do you say, can you go collect some relics for us?"No problem."

Wer-weren’t you scared?
Did any kumases follow you?"No, I’ve got skills."

Good! Good!!

these relics will really help our bottom line.

I give my consent to a temporary leave of absence for Titus. But I'm trusting you to bring him back in one piece!"I will."
